info.name: DunDealStylish - Smoking Black
info.description: A simple layout for those among us who don't like staring at light bulbs at night or just like to add a little bit of style to their Showdown experience. Shoutout to @ElliottInnit on Twitter for helping me out with some of the stuff I couldn't figure out!
info.additionalInfo:
If you want to use this layout as a template for your own layout or use parts of it and redistribute it, you must credit me, the original creator. Rules for the license here: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/

- Added a new background

25-11-2014, 10:49:

28-11-2015, 17:33;
